verses.text: O \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*; for he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* marvellous \w things|strong="H6381"\w*: his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, hath gotten him the \w victory|strong="H3467"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath made \w known|strong="H3045"\w* his \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*: his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* hath he openly \w shewed|strong="H1540"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 98.2 \ft openly…: or, revealed\f*

He hath \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and his \w truth|strong="H0530"\w* toward the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: all the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Make a joyful \w noise|strong="H7321"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: make a loud \w noise|strong="H6476"\w*, and \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w*, and \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* praise.

\w Sing|strong="H2167"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with the \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*; with the \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w psalm|strong="H2172"\w*.

With \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* and \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of \w cornet|strong="H7782"\w* make a joyful \w noise|strong="H7321"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w King|strong="H4428"\w*.

Let the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w roar|strong="H7481"\w*, and the \w fulness|strong="H4393"\w* thereof; the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, and they that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.\f + \fr 98.7 \ft the fulness…: or, all it containeth\f*

Let the \w floods|strong="H5104"\w* \w clap|strong="H4222"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*: let the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* be \w joyful|strong="H7442"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*

\w Before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: with \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* shall he \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with \w equity|strong="H4339"\w*.
